description.value:
Your exposed skin is covered in fine, needle-like hairs that you can flick into the eyes of enemies.

Activateâ€”Urticating Burst 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You flick tiny spines in a @Template[cone|distance:15], dealing @Damage[2d8[piercing]|options:area-damage] damage to all creatures in the area with a @Check[reflex|dc:18|basic|options:area-effect] save. On a critical failure, the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] until the end of their next turn.
